name: Deenanath Mangeshkar
description: '''Deenanath Mangeshkar''' ({{IPA|mr|d̪iːnanaːt̪ʰ məŋɡeːʃkəɾ}}; 29 December 1900 – 24 April 1942) was an Indian actor, [[Natya Sangeet]] musician and, [[Hindustani classical music|Hindustani classical]] vocalist who was active in [[Marathi theatre]]. He is the father of well-known singers [[Lata Mangeshkar]], [[Asha Bhosle]], [[Meena Khadikar]] and [[Usha Mangeshkar]] as well as composer [[Hridaynath Mangeshkar]].
